channel.title: Sql help
channel.description: Sql is the biggest pain in my ass in trying to run my server. It seems like it isnt saving the accounts properly. When you go to create the account on the page it says its create then when you try to login it says invalid pass, but says the account is created. I just found out if you put 1 space in for the pass it lets you log in but wont let you validate it.
